system.descriptor: Directing those the user has authority over such that a group may perform more complex actions. Successful tests mean group is directed in timely manner, failure may mean group is confused, misinterpreted, unmotivated, etc.
system.uses:
Uses: Sending Comrades into dangerous situations, rallying the squad or organising them during a surprise attack. Can affect a number of people up to 10x Character's Fellowship Bonus
Special Uses: Inspire: Full Action, +0 Test. If Successful, Inspired Followers receive +10 to their next Skill or Characteristic Test.
Terrify: Reaction to counter effects of fear vs Fear causing foe. Opposed Command vs Willpower of Fear-Causing Creature, +10 per level of Fear Trait. Succeed and followers ignore effects of fear from creature.
